summary.para: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current raw-image write operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2RawCD object in script.

param.name: progress
param.para: An interface that you use to determine the progress of the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2RawCD object in script.

remarks.para: Notifications are sent in response to calling the or method.
To stop the write process, call the method.

summary.para: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current raw-image write operation.
